subject: Bribery and Kickbacks
Courts and the Judiciary
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: A German judge agreed to let Mr. Ecclestone pay a $100 million penalty in return for quashing a criminal case of bribery that could have sent him to jail for up to 10 years.
snippet: A German judge agreed to let Mr. Ecclestone pay a $100 million penalty in return for quashing a criminal case of bribery that could have sent him to jail for up to 10 years.
